reviewText:
Amazing , earth shattering , changed my life and got me on a new track that will make my playing far better for ever .
  I do not know how I got along with out this teacher as my guide through the learning experience .
The best DADGAD instruction I've worked with.
Not only is Al Pattiway a great guitarist he's a great teacher
Very nicely put together, instruction was great. Easy to learn tunes. Love the techniques. I love this DVD and am very happy with it.
